concept.title: What is a test case step?

definition.p: An atomic action that has a specific reuslt. It is executed in the larger context of a Test Case.

partsAndFunctions.p: Here are the parts of a test case step:

tr.td: A number that is unique in the test script among all steps in its test cases.
A command or gesture needed to invoke the expected result.
When testing finds a bug, these patterns show how the bug is to be reported.
Instruction or explanation that would detract from clarity in the other parts of the step. An optional part.
